text: Mata keiten'notami to giron suru sai ni wa, rippana (taido de) nozome. Kare-ra no naka fugi o okonau mono ni taishite wa betsudearu. Sore de itte yaru ga 카. `Watashi-tachi wa, jibun-tachi ni kudasa reta mono o shinji, anata gata ni kudasa reta mono o shinjiru. Watashi-tachi no kami (arr훮) to anata gata no kami (arr훮) wa onajidearu. Watashi-tachi wa kare ni fukuj큰, kie suru nodearu
